title: All-Clad's "Awesome" Nonstick Two-Piece Set Might Be the Only Cookware You Need
description: These two pans offer serious versatility! READ MORE...
author: Micki Wagner
excerpt: These two pans offer serious versatility!

I’m based in New York, NY.published nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Sarah CrowleyAs someone who tests and writes about kitchen products for a living, I have tried my fair share of cookware. The pans I turn to daily in my kitchen? They’re all nonstick. I’ve used other kinds of pans, like stainless steel and cast iron, but the ones I return to time and again are my nonstick pans. This is largely because they’re a breeze to clean, and good ones can last you a number of years. And right now, there is one nonstick cookware set I’ve been eyeing from a brand that is known for delivering quality cookware.All-Clad is particularly well-known for its stainless steel cookware, but there’s a nonstick pan set that’s currently on sale on the brand’s site that has my attention. This set is the HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set. Not only would this be seriously versatile in your kitchen, but it’s also 20% off!What Is the All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set?Whether you’re looking to refresh your nonstick cookware or you’re shopping for someone who is outfitting their very first kitchen, the All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set is a great option. As the name suggests, this set comes with a four-quart sauté pan (and lid!) along with a 10-inch fry pan. The sizes of these two pans make them super versatile, as you’ll be able to make tons of dishes, like stir-fry, Bolognese, and chicken cutlets in the sauté pan and scrambled eggs, steak, and sautéed veggies in the fry pan, to name a few.These pans are made even more versatile by the fact that you can safely put them both in the oven if you need to — and even the sauté pan’s lid is oven-safe (although only for an oven that’s 350°F or less, whereas the pans themselves are good up until 500°F). Better yet, these pans can also be tossed right into your dishwasher for easy cleaning. What All-Clad Reviewers Are Saying “I love my All-Clad cookware. The quality is unchallenged, great. I love that these can be used on my induction stove.” —FrankB “Heats evenly, cleans easily. Just what we wanted.” —Dale123 “Essential pan, even heat distribution and easy cleanup!” —Chef Ron You might know All-Clad for its stainless steel pans, but don’t sleep on the brand’s nonstick options. Not only are they easy to clean, but they also offer serious versatility. And right now, you can get this nonstick pan set for less, so it’s an awesome time to give them a try in your own kitchen! Buy: All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set, $159.99 (normally, $199.98)My Kitchn HelperGet our favorite editor-tested and -approved finds sent twice a week to your inbox.
html:
• Kitchen & Home
  • Life In The Kitchen

Micki WagnerCommerce Writer

I cover everything kitchen-related, from cookware and countertop appliances to pantry staples and cleaning and organizing must-haves. I’m based in New York, NY.

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

As someone who tests and writes about kitchen products for a living, I have tried my fair share of cookware. The pans I turn to daily in my kitchen? They’re all nonstick. I’ve used other kinds of pans, like stainless steel and cast iron, but the ones I return to time and again are my nonstick pans. This is largely because they’re a breeze to clean, and good ones can last you a number of years. And right now, there is one nonstick cookware set I’ve been eyeing from a brand that is known for delivering quality cookware.

All-Clad is particularly well-known for its stainless steel cookware, but there’s a nonstick pan set that’s currently on sale on the brand’s site that has my attention. This set is the HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set. Not only would this be seriously versatile in your kitchen, but it’s also 20% off!

What Is the All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set?

Whether you’re looking to refresh your nonstick cookware or you’re shopping for someone who is outfitting their very first kitchen, the All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set is a great option. As the name suggests, this set comes with a four-quart sauté pan (and lid!) along with a 10-inch fry pan. The sizes of these two pans make them super versatile, as you’ll be able to make tons of dishes, like stir-fry, Bolognese, and chicken cutlets in the sauté pan and scrambled eggs, steak, and sautéed veggies in the fry pan, to name a few.

These pans are made even more versatile by the fact that you can safely put them both in the oven if you need to — and even the sauté pan’s lid is oven-safe (although only for an oven that’s 350°F or less, whereas the pans themselves are good up until 500°F). Better yet, these pans can also be tossed right into your dishwasher for easy cleaning. 

What All-Clad Reviewers Are Saying

“I love my All-Clad cookware. The quality is unchallenged, great. I love that these can be used on my induction stove.” —FrankB

“Heats evenly, cleans easily. Just what we wanted.” —Dale123

“Essential pan, even heat distribution and easy cleanup!” —Chef Ron

You might know All-Clad for its stainless steel pans, but don’t sleep on the brand’s nonstick options. Not only are they easy to clean, but they also offer serious versatility. And right now, you can get this nonstick pan set for less, so it’s an awesome time to give them a try in your own kitchen! 

Buy: All-Clad HA1 Nonstick Fry Pan and Sauté Pan Set, $159.99 (normally, $199.98)
